```{r}
library(boot)
library(dplyr)

JustGrandRecessions <- filter(CompleteGrandWithRecession, RecessionDay == 1)

GrandSpringRecessions <- filter(JustGrandRecessions, Spring == 1)
GrandSummerRecessions <- filter(JustGrandRecessions, Summer == 1)

GrandSpringRecessionsHighRF <- filter(GrandSpringRecessions, HighRainfall == 1)
GrandSummerRecessionsHighRF <- filter(GrandSummerRecessions, HighRainfall == 1)
GrandSpringRecessionsLowRF <- filter(GrandSpringRecessions, HighRainfall == 0)
GrandSummerRecessionsLowRF <- filter(GrandSummerRecessions, HighRainfall == 0)

GrandSpringRecessionsHighSoilTemp <- filter(GrandSpringRecessions, HighSoilTemp== 1)
GrandSummerRecessionsHighSoilTemp <- filter(GrandSummerRecessions, HighSoilTemp == 1)
GrandSpringRecessionsLowSoilTemp <- filter(GrandSpringRecessions, HighSoilTemp == 0)
GrandSummerRecessionsLowSoilTemp <- filter(GrandSummerRecessions, HighSoilTemp == 0)

GrandSpringRecessionsHighTemp <- filter(GrandSpringRecessions, HighTemp== 1)
GrandSummerRecessionsHighTemp <- filter(GrandSummerRecessions, HighTemp == 1)
GrandSpringRecessionsLowTemp <- filter(GrandSpringRecessions, HighTemp == 0)
GrandSummerRecessionsLowTemp <- filter(GrandSummerRecessions, HighTemp == 0)

GrandSpringRecessionsHighSF <- filter(GrandSpringRecessions, HighSnowFallWinterPrior== 1)
GrandSummerRecessionsHighSF <- filter(GrandSummerRecessions, HighSnowFallWinterPrior == 1)
GrandSpringRecessionsLowSF <- filter(GrandSpringRecessions, HighSnowFallWinterPrior == 0)
GrandSummerRecessionsLowSF <- filter(GrandSummerRecessions, HighSnowFallWinterPrior == 0)

set.seed(4444)  # for reproducibility
data(GrandSpringRecessions)
x <- nrow(GrandSpringRecessions)
y <- 1000
bootGSpr <- GrandSpringRecessions[sample(x,y,replace = TRUE),]

set.seed(4444)  # for reproducibility
data(GrandSummerRecessions)
x <- nrow(GrandSummerRecessions)
y <- 1000
bootGSum <- GrandSummerRecessions[sample(x,y,replace = TRUE),]
```
